models.name: DatastreamSource
models.doc: Datastream source that connector will use to consume events

fields.name: connectionString
fields.doc: Source connection string to consume the data from.

fields.name: partitions
fields.doc: Number of partitions in the source.

models.name: DatastreamDestination
models.doc: Datastream destination details that the transport provider will use to send events

fields.name: connectionString
fields.doc: Destination connection string to write the data to.

fields.name: partitions
fields.doc: Number of partitions in the destination.

fields.name: keySerDe
fields.doc: SerDe used to serialize/deserialize the key.

fields.name: payloadSerDe
fields.doc: SerDe used to serialize/deserialize the payload.

fields.name: envelopeSerDe
fields.doc: SerDe used to serialize/deserialize the envelope.

fields.name: connectorName
fields.doc: Name of the connector to be used for reading the change capture events from the source, e.g. Oracle, Espresso, OracleBootstrap, EspressoBootstrap, Mysql etc..

fields.name: source
fields.doc: Source that connector can use to connect to the data store and consume the data.

symbolDocs.READY: Datastream destination is created, datastream is split into tasks and assigned and ready for producing and consumption.
symbolDocs.INITIALIZING: Datastream is created, but not initialized yet.

fields.name: destination
fields.doc: Datastream destination string that the transport provider will use to send the events

fields.name: metadata
fields.doc: Generic metadata for Datastream (e.g. owner, expiration, etc). Metadata is stored as user defined name/value pair.

finders.name: findGroup
finders.doc: You can access this FINDER method via /resources/datastream?q=findDuplicates&datastreamName=name

actions.name: pauseSourcePartitions
actions.doc: Given datastream and a map representing < source, list of partitions to pause >, pauses the partitions.

parameters.name: sourcePartitions
parameters.doc:
StringMap of format <source, comma separated list of partitions or "*">. Example: <"FooTopic", "0,13,2">
                         or <"FooTopic","*">

actions.name: resumeSourcePartitions
actions.doc: Given datastream and a map representing < source, list of partitions to resume >, resumes the partitions.

parameters.name: sourcePartitions
parameters.doc:
StringMap of format <source, comma separated list of partitions or "*">. Example: <"FooTopic", "0,13,2">
                         or <"FooTopic","*">
